message: Let's split it 60-40, a fair start!
I think we can do better than 60-40. Let's start with a 55-45 split, this will give us both more to work with.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve a bit more. Let's try 52-48, a fair middle ground!
Let's meet in the middle and split the money evenly. This way, we both get a fair share and we can avoid further rounds of negotiation.
